Posts.Content: Macab4 wrote: I got a call today from the radiology department and they want to do another picture of my left breast because they saw some "thickening above the nipple area" and of course I panicked and started crying and they transferred me to my doctor. She said she does not see any cancer, mass tissue or calcification and that I should not worry. How can I not, I'm mortified and can't think of anything else. She said it's nothing to worry about and that they just want to take precaution. Please help I'm making myself sick just thinking and worrying about it. I asked if I can be seen sooner but I have to wait until July 1st and that I should not worry. any one else out there that have gone through this?? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mammogram Macab4 vbishop
